content.original: Eviction
content.prevOriginal: Eviction
content.content: Eviction

content.original: Your target is the nearby {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} base.
content.prevOriginal: Your target is the nearby {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} base.
content.content: Your target is the nearby {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} base.

content.original: Assault the base and destroy enough of it to force {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} to abandon the location.
content.prevOriginal: Assault the base and destroy enough of it to force {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} to abandon the location.
content.content: Assault the base and destroy enough of it to force {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} to abandon the location.

content.original: We should expect strong opposition on this one. Be wary, Commander. Oliveira out.
content.prevOriginal: We should expect strong opposition on this one. Be wary, Commander. Oliveira out.
content.content: We should expect strong opposition on this one. Be wary, Commander. Oliveira out.

content.original: Mission successful, Commander. I'll see you on the Argo.
content.prevOriginal: Mission successful, Commander. I'll see you on the Argo.
content.content: Mission successful, Commander. I'll see you on the Argo.

content.original: You'd better return to the Argo, Commander, so we can sort this out.
content.prevOriginal: You'd better return to the Argo, Commander, so we can sort this out.
content.content: You'd better return to the Argo, Commander, so we can sort this out.

content.original: There's that strong opposition, Commander. Watch your position and don't get flanked.
content.prevOriginal: There's that strong opposition, Commander. Watch your position and don't get flanked.
content.content: There's that strong opposition, Commander. Watch your position and don't get flanked.

content.original: We've demolished the objective buildings. No need to loiter, get to the evac zone.
content.prevOriginal: We've demolished the objective buildings. No need to loiter, get to the evac zone.
content.content: We've demolished the objective buildings. No need to loiter, get to the evac zone.

content.original: Good shots, Commander! You scored a solid hit on one of the target structures, keep it up.
content.prevOriginal: Good shots, Commander! You scored a solid hit on one of the target structures, keep it up.
content.content: Good shots, Commander! You scored a solid hit on one of the target structures, keep it up.

content.original: Target building destroyed, good work commander, stay at it and we'll be done in no time.
content.prevOriginal: Target building destroyed, good work commander, stay at it and we'll be done in no time.
content.content: Target building destroyed, good work commander, stay at it and we'll be done in no time.

content.original: Bkt_KillConfirmed: The garrison is destroyed. Good Work.
content.prevOriginal: Bkt_KillConfirmed: The garrison is destroyed. Good Work.
content.content: Bkt_KillConfirmed: The garrison is destroyed. Good Work.

content.original: We should expect heavy resistance; {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} isn't saying what's in that facility, but whatever it is has them riled up.
content.prevOriginal: We should expect heavy resistance; {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} isn't saying what's in that facility, but whatever it is has them riled up.
content.content: We should expect heavy resistance; {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} isn't saying what's in that facility, but whatever it is has them riled up.

content.original: Get to the evac zone
content.prevOriginal: Get to the evac zone
content.content: Get to the evac zone

content.original: The {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} manufacturing facility on {TGT_SYSTEM.name} is an illegal intrusion into our territory, and a cover for military personnel and units. Our efforts to resolve this through diplomatic channels have been rebuffed, so we are now turning to a military solution. The facility must be destroyed.
content.prevOriginal: The {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} manufacturing facility on {TGT_SYSTEM.name} is an illegal intrusion into our territory, and a cover for military personnel and units. Our efforts to resolve this through diplomatic channels have been rebuffed, so we are now turning to a military solution. The facility must be destroyed.
content.content: The {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} manufacturing facility on {TGT_SYSTEM.name} is an illegal intrusion into our territory, and a cover for military personnel and units. Our efforts to resolve this through diplomatic channels have been rebuffed, so we are now turning to a military solution. The facility must be destroyed.

content.original: Factory Recall
content.prevOriginal: Factory Recall
content.content: Factory Recall

content.original: Okay, folks, I've spotted another DropShip in the area, with {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} markings. So now we know who we're fighting.
content.prevOriginal: Okay, folks, I've spotted another DropShip in the area, with {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} markings. So now we know who we're fighting.
content.content: Okay, folks, I've spotted another DropShip in the area, with {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} markings. So now we know who we're fighting.

content.original: Yang, what's your read on that factory? Are they building 'Mechs?
content.prevOriginal: Yang, what's your read on that factory? Are they building 'Mechs?
content.content: Yang, what's your read on that factory? Are they building 'Mechs?

content.original: Those look like Orion parts. One sec... Nah, it's only partially powered up. Another few days, though, and this battle woulda been a lot harder.
content.prevOriginal: Those look like Orion parts. One sec... Nah, it's only partially powered up. Another few days, though, and this battle woulda been a lot harder.
content.content: Those look like Orion parts. One sec... Nah, it's only partially powered up. Another few days, though, and this battle woulda been a lot harder.

content.original: Well then, Commander, you know what to do. When you're done, Meyer will be on station to pick you up from this LZ.
content.prevOriginal: Well then, Commander, you know what to do. When you're done, Meyer will be on station to pick you up from this LZ.
content.content: Well then, Commander, you know what to do. When you're done, Meyer will be on station to pick you up from this LZ.

content.original: Damn, I hate to see all that hardware turned to scrap. Imagine if we could have gotten a half-dozen of those Orions working.
content.prevOriginal: Damn, I hate to see all that hardware turned to scrap. Imagine if we could have gotten a half-dozen of those Orions working.
content.content: Damn, I hate to see all that hardware turned to scrap. Imagine if we could have gotten a half-dozen of those Orions working.

content.original: Yeah, I'm imagining getting shot by them. Commander, let's go home.
content.prevOriginal: Yeah, I'm imagining getting shot by them. Commander, let's go home.
content.content: Yeah, I'm imagining getting shot by them. Commander, let's go home.

content.original: Dammit. I just hope they can't get that factory powered all the way up. Let's debrief back in orbit, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: Dammit. I just hope they can't get that factory powered all the way up. Let's debrief back in orbit, Commander.
content.content: Dammit. I just hope they can't get that factory powered all the way up. Let's debrief back in orbit, Commander.

content.original: They've got multiple units protecting this facility, careful not to get caught in an ambush.
content.prevOriginal: They've got multiple units protecting this facility, careful not to get caught in an ambush.
content.content: They've got multiple units protecting this facility, careful not to get caught in an ambush.

content.original: Get to the evac zone
content.prevOriginal: Get to the evac zone
content.content: Get to the evac zone

content.original: A routine sweep of the planet's surface revealed something unexpected: a power signature coming from the location of an abandoned facility. From the readings we're getting, it could be a 'Mech factory powering up. We're not in a good strategic position to claim the factory, so we need you to find it and destroy it. If we act quickly, we can deal with this before any 'Mechs are produced. If you do come across any newly produced 'Mechs, of course, you should reduce them to scrap as well.
content.prevOriginal: A routine sweep of the planet's surface revealed something unexpected: a power signature coming from the location of an abandoned facility. If we act quickly, we can deal with this before any 'Mechs are produced. If you do come across any newly produced 'Mechs, of course, you should reduce them to scrap as well.

content.original: In other words, keep your eyes peeled for those Orions. When you're done, Meyer will be on station to pick you up from this LZ.

content.original: It's... shit. Boss, you're about to have company, of the Orion ON1-K variety. Looks like two 'Mechs, but I can't tell if their weapons systems are live.

content.original: Get to the evac zone

content.content: Get to the evac zone

content.original: Our {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} enemies are hiding restricted munitions in a series of warehouses used to distribute medical supplies. We would make a public accusation that they're hiding munitions in medical supplies, but that would reveal the source of our intel. Instead, we need you to go in and do what we cannot: destroy the warehouses.
content.prevOriginal: Our {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} enemies are hiding restricted munitions in a series of warehouses used to distribute medical supplies. We would make a public accusation that they're hiding munitions in medical supplies, but that would reveal the source of our intel. Instead, we need you to go in and do what we cannot: destroy the warehouses.

content.original: Liberation
content.prevOriginal: Liberation
content.content: Liberation

content.original: Commander, our target is just ahead. You need to knock down enough structures to cripple the facility.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, our target is just ahead. You need to knock down enough structures to cripple the facility.
content.content: Commander, our target is just ahead. You need to knock down enough structures to cripple the facility.

content.original: Watch for fixed gun emplacements and enemy defenders. These pirates have nothing to lose, so they'll be desperate.
content.prevOriginal: Watch for fixed gun emplacements and enemy defenders. These pirates have nothing to lose, so they'll be desperate.
content.content: Watch for fixed gun emplacements and enemy defenders. These pirates have nothing to lose, so they'll be desperate.

content.original: There may be additional enemy units deployed away from the base, so keep your eyes open. Oliveira out.
content.prevOriginal: There may be additional enemy units deployed away from the base, so keep your eyes open. Oliveira out.
content.content: There may be additional enemy units deployed away from the base, so keep your eyes open. Oliveira out.

content.original: Well done, Commander. Any remaining pirate forces will have nowhere to hide.
content.prevOriginal: Well done, Commander. Any remaining pirate forces will have nowhere to hide.
content.content: Well done, Commander. Any remaining pirate forces will have nowhere to hide.

content.original: That was catastrophic, Commander. I'm pulling the plug on this mission.
content.prevOriginal: That was catastrophic, Commander. I'm pulling the plug on this mission.
content.content: That was catastrophic, Commander. I'm pulling the plug on this mission.

content.original: As I suspected, Commander. We've picked up additional pirate forces closing on your position.
content.prevOriginal: As I suspected, Commander. We've picked up additional pirate forces closing on your position.
content.content: As I suspected, Commander. We've picked up additional pirate forces closing on your position.

content.original: We've demolished the objective buildings. No need to loiter, get to the evac zone.
content.prevOriginal: We've demolished the objective buildings. No need to loiter, get to the evac zone.
content.content: We've demolished the objective buildings. No need to loiter, get to the evac zone.

content.original: Good shots, Commander! You scored a solid hit on one of the target structures, keep it up.
content.prevOriginal: Good shots, Commander! You scored a solid hit on one of the target structures, keep it up.
content.content: Good shots, Commander! You scored a solid hit on one of the target structures, keep it up.

content.original: Target building destroyed, good work commander, stay at it and we'll be done in no time.
content.prevOriginal: Target building destroyed, good work commander, stay at it and we'll be done in no time.
content.content: Target building destroyed, good work commander, stay at it and we'll be done in no time.

content.original: Bkt_KillConfirmed: The garrison is destroyed. Good Work.
content.prevOriginal: Bkt_KillConfirmed: The garrison is destroyed. Good Work.
content.content: Bkt_KillConfirmed: The garrison is destroyed. Good Work.

content.original: If there are enough pirates there to present a problem for local authorities, we should be prepared for a tough fight, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: If there are enough pirates there to present a problem for local authorities, we should be prepared for a tough fight, Commander.
content.content: If there are enough pirates there to present a problem for local authorities, we should be prepared for a tough fight, Commander.

content.original: Get to the evac zone
content.prevOriginal: Get to the evac zone
content.content: Get to the evac zone

content.original: A heavily armed pirate band has taken control of a facility on {TGT_SYSTEM.Name} and are using it as a base of operations for raiding and terrorizing nearby settlements. The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} authorities do not have the local military resources to assault the base, given how extensively they've entrenched. We need you to destroy the base so that they can no longer use it as a staging area for their criminal acts.
content.prevOriginal: A heavily armed pirate band has taken control of a facility on {TGT_SYSTEM.Name} and are using it as a base of operations for raiding and terrorizing nearby settlements. The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} authorities do not have the local military resources to assault the base, given how extensively they've entrenched. We need you to destroy the base so that they can no longer use it as a staging area for their criminal acts.

content.original: THIS IS AN AUTOMATED WARNING. YOU ARE ENTERING A RESTRICTED AREA. WITHDRAW OR YOU WILL BE FIRED ON.
content.prevOriginal: THIS IS AN AUTOMATED WARNING. YOU ARE ENTERING A RESTRICTED AREA. WITHDRAW OR YOU WILL BE FIRED ON.
content.content: THIS IS AN AUTOMATED WARNING. YOU ARE ENTERING A RESTRICTED AREA. WITHDRAW OR YOU WILL BE FIRED ON.

content.original: I don't know, Commander. They seem really serious. Maybe we should--
content.prevOriginal: I don't know, Commander. They seem really serious. Maybe we should--
content.content: I don't know, Commander. They seem really serious. Maybe we should--

content.original: I'm kidding! I'm kidding. Let's wreck some stuff.
content.prevOriginal: I'm kidding! I'm kidding. Let's wreck some stuff.
content.content: I'm kidding! I'm kidding. Let's wreck some stuff.

content.original: Anybody still inside that facility is not going to be doing much talking anytime soon, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: Anybody still inside that facility is not going to be doing much talking anytime soon, Commander.
content.content: Anybody still inside that facility is not going to be doing much talking anytime soon, Commander.

content.original: Commander, I don't know what happened down there, but we need to extract, now.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, I don't know what happened down there, but we need to extract, now.
content.content: Commander, I don't know what happened down there, but we need to extract, now.

content.original: They've got multiple units protecting this facility, careful not to get caught in an ambush.

content.original: We had a few associates go missing recently, and where should they happen to turn up but a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} black site? We have to assume they're being interrogated right now. Normally, we'd be extremely concerned for their welfare and we'd try to rescue them, but in this case it seems likely they're beyond rescue. We need you to level that black site, to ensure any secrets they've spilled are erased.
